TopicTitle: How Close are YOU to Your Next Reputation Rank?

Articles.Content:
Just got my third green bar ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif) Really happy!

I think I'm like 84 points away from the next one.

EDIT: Woooooooow. Exactly 83 points away. Missed it by THAT much!

I'm 30 points away from 3 bars. I'm posting a lot more lately, so maybe I'll hit 3 bars shortly. Hopefully. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

help please

FIVE!! And I've only just started editing stock textures! Expect a color correction pack sometime soon as well as a new heat shield texture if I can edit them easily.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-23T15:09:26Z" title="04/23/2015 03:09  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 23, 2015</time> by Avera9eJoe**

Probably quite a long way. Only 10 points.

Makes me realize how seldom I post, given that I joined before the 2013 forum crash.

only 10 more till I get three bars! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-23T22:53:05Z" title="04/23/2015 10:53  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 23, 2015</time> by Endersmens**

3 more. The suspense is unreal.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-24T01:37:19Z" title="04/24/2015 01:37  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 24, 2015</time> by Zucal**

> 
> Also, finally got an avatar! Let's see if anyone even knows what it is...

I don't think Captain Haddock is really that obscure. 

At time of posting, I'm at 98.
wow, i need 5 points for 3 bars. :/

Well, then. Now it's 98..

![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)thanks, Columbia!

Interesting how one can get boatloads of rep just by arrogantly stating how close they are to their next rank, but won't usually get any if they post helpful responses, cool screenshots, etc. Baah, who cares. I'm 40 away from my next rank and I'd love to reach it. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Well, then. Now it's 98..
> ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)thanks, Columbia!

Don't mention it. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

I'm 55 points away from a third bar. I need to get to work!
So close I can see it on the horizon!

I've gotten 14 +reps in the past week alone, I'm doing just fine. Should hit my 4th light green bar before too long ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
A long way to go now I hit my fourth.

I'm at 1000 and 3. ![:0.0:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_shocked.gif)

Wow. Where did all of that come from?!

So... 97 points.

Guys, you won't bloody believe it!l

I had a dream last night that I had two light-green rep bars! Then I woke up... ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)

> 
> Guys, you won't bloody believe it!l

I also dreamt that Maxmaps and KasperVld repped my posts.. It was sad to wake up. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Just got my last Rep+ and it pushed me to 3 bars!

Yea!

Wow, we all dreamed the same thing! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) 2spooky4me!
i'm at 5 points, i got the 5 on my first day on the forum, not got one since.

What's the second one? At 

I have about 18 rep
Im at 99 points so PLEASE REP ME NOW i cant take being so close but still no banana! ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

How do you know whens your next reputation? ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif) All it says is like 38 or something like that. My goal is atleast have 3 bars or two so I dont look like the general population of the forum. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Just around 70 more rep now ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
